languages.text: Когда маяк отрывается от своей платформы, по огромным стержням, пронзающим статуи из плоти, пробегает лилово-алый импульс. Все безобразные фигуры разом охватывает ослепительно синее пламя, воздух наполняется бессвязными криками и запахом горелого мяса.

traits.locale_text: В ту же секунду, когда маяк отрывается от своей платформы, по огромным шипам, пронзающим статуи из плоти, пробегает лилово-алый импульс. Все безобразные фигуры разом охватывает ослепительно синее пламя, воздух наполняется запахом горелого мяса и бессвязных криков.

languages.text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.
languages.original_text: Когда маяк отрывается от своей платформы, по огромным стержням, пронзающим статуи из плоти, пробегает лилово-алый импульс. Все безобразные фигуры разом охватывает ослепительно синее пламя, воздух наполняется бессвязными криками и запахом горелого мяса.

traits.locale_text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a lilac-scarlet impulse runs across the giant rods piercing the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a lilac-scarlet impulse runs across the giant rods piercing the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

languages.text: 当侦察兵从将信标从平台上扯下来的时候，深紫色的脉冲流过了贯穿血肉雕像的巨大黑柱。眩目的蓝色火焰立刻吞没了这些亵渎的雕像，空气中瞬间充满了语无伦次的尖叫声与焦肉的气味。
languages.original_text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

traits.locale_text: 当侦察兵从将信标从平台上扯下来的时候，深紫色的脉冲流过了贯穿血肉雕像的巨大黑柱。眩目的蓝色火焰立刻吞没了这些亵渎的雕像，空气中瞬间充满了语无伦次的尖叫声与焦肉的气味。

languages.text: ビーコンがそのプラットフォームから引き剥がされると、肉体の彫像を貫く巨大な棒に、緋色がかった薄紫色の衝撃が走る。支離滅裂な叫び声と肉の焼ける臭いが充満する中、穢れた者たちはみな、目もくらむような青い炎に一斉に包まれる。
languages.original_text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

traits.locale_text: ビーコンがそのプラットフォームから引き剥がされると、肉体の彫像を貫く巨大な棒に、緋色がかった薄紫色の衝撃が走る。支離滅裂な叫び声と肉の焼ける臭いが充満する中、穢れた者たちはみな、目もくらむような青い炎に一斉に包まれる。

languages.text: Una vez que se arranca la baliza de su plataforma, un impulso escarlata y lila recorre las gigantescas barras que atraviesan las estatuas de carne. Todas las figuras impías son atrapadas a la vez por cegadoras llamas azules mientras el aire se llena de gritos coléricos y olor a carne quemada.
languages.original_text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

traits.locale_text: Una vez que se arranca la baliza de su plataforma, un impulso escarlata y lila recorre las gigantescas barras que atraviesan las estatuas de carne. Todas las figuras impías son atrapadas a la vez por cegadoras llamas azules mientras el aire se llena de gritos coléricos y olor a carne quemada.

languages.text: Nachdem der Sender von seiner Plattform gerissen wird, durchströmt ein scharlachrot-violetter Impuls die riesigen Stäbe, welche in den Fleischstatuen stecken. All die unheiligen Gestalten werden gleichzeitig von einer blenden blauen Flamme erfasst. Die Luft füllt sich mit unverständlichen Schreien und dem Geruch von verbranntem Fleisch.
languages.original_text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem der Sender von seiner Plattform gerissen wird, durchströmt ein scharlachrot-violetter Impuls die riesigen Stäbe, welche in den Fleischstatuen stecken. All die unheiligen Gestalten werden gleichzeitig von einer blenden blauen Flamme erfasst. Die Luft füllt sich mit unverständlichen Schreien und dem Geruch von verbranntem Fleisch.

languages.text: Une fois la balise extraite de sa plateforme, une pulsation pourpre parcourt les tiges immenses qui transpercent ces statues de chair. Les créatures impies sont aussitôt enveloppées de flammes d'un bleu aveuglant alors que l'air s'emplit de hurlements incohérents et de l'odeur de la viande brûlée.
languages.original_text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.

traits.locale_text: Une fois la balise extraite de sa plateforme, une pulsation pourpre parcourt les tiges immenses qui transpercent ces statues de chair. Les créatures impies sont aussitôt enveloppées de flammes d'un bleu aveuglant alors que l'air s'emplit de hurlements incohérents et de l'odeur de la viande brûlée.

languages.text: Parıldağın platformdan sökülmesiyle bu etten heykelleri delen, muazzam çubukların üzerine kızıllı morlu bir darbe iniyor. Hava, tutarsız çığlıklar ve yanık et kokusuyla doluyor; uğursuz yaratıklar, o anda kör edici, mavi alevlerle kaplanıyor.
languages.original_text: Once the beacon is torn off its platform, a scarlet-lilac impulse runs across the giant rods that pierce the statues of flesh. All the unholy figures are gripped at once by blinding blue flame as the air is filled with incoherent screams and the smell of burned meat.
